code:
-spec count_interesting_subarrays(Nums :: [integer()], Modulo :: integer(), K :: integer()) -> integer().
count_interesting_subarrays(Nums, Modulo, K) ->
    count_interesting_subarrays(Nums, Modulo, K, maps:new(), 0, 0, 1).

count_interesting_subarrays([], _Modulo, _K, _Map, Count, _CurrentSum, _Index) ->
    Count;
count_interesting_subarrays([H | T], Modulo, K, Map, Count, CurrentSum, Index) ->
    NewCurrentSum = (CurrentSum + H) rem Modulo,
    MapUpdated = maps:put(NewCurrentSum, maps:get(NewCurrentSum, Map, 0) + 1, Map),
    InitialCount = case K == 0 of
        true -> Count + maps:get(0, Map, 0); % Special case for K = 0
        false -> Count
    end,
    NewCount = lists:foldl(
        fun(I, Acc) ->
            SumI = (NewCurrentSum - I + Modulo) rem Modulo,
            Acc + case SumI == K of
                true -> maps:get(I, Map, 0);
                false -> 0
            end
        end, InitialCount, maps:keys(Map)),
    count_interesting_subarrays(T, Modulo, K, MapUpdated, NewCount, NewCurrentSum, Index + 1).
